description: SouthGobi Resources Ltd., together with its subsidiaries, operates as an integrated coal mining, development, and exploration company in Mongolia, Hong Kong, and China. It primarily explores for coking and thermal coal. The company's flagship project is the Ovoot Tolgoi open pit coal mine located in the Umnugobi Aimag of Mongolia. It also holds interest in Zag Suuj and Soumber Projects. In addition, the company engages in the logistics and trading of coal in Mongolia and China. The company was formerly known as SouthGobi Energy Resources Ltd. and changed its name to SouthGobi Resources Ltd. in May 2010. SouthGobi Resources Ltd. was incorporated in 2002 and is based in Mong kok, Hong Kong.
